body_html:
@apaszke @soumith Thanks, guys! These tricks have given me some road ahead to make this replication possible!

It'd be interesting to know how the authors were able to accomplish 1 GPU with 800+ iterations. But alas, we do not have their code and I do not bother them with too many questions. Thanks for your help!

body:
@apaszke @soumith Thanks, guys! These tricks have given me some road ahead to make this replication possible!

It'd be interesting to know how the authors were able to accomplish 1 GPU with 800+ iterations. But alas, we do not have their code and I do not bother them with too many questions. Thanks for your help!
